actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation

official_title: A bill expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to certain actions which should be taken in anticipation of the centennial anniversary of the Statue of Liberty National Monument, and directing the Secretary of the Interior to retain the American Museum of Immigration at the base of the Statue of Liberty National Monument.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the American Museum of Immigration should be rehabilitated for the centennial anniversary of the Statue of Liberty National Monument. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to retain the American Museum of Immigration at the base of the Statue of Liberty.

titles.title: A bill expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to certain actions which should be taken in anticipation of the centennial anniversary of the Statue of Liberty National Monument, and directing the Secretary of the Interior to retain the American Museum of Immigration at the base of the Statue of Liberty National Monument.
